question: There are 9 periods in the day for a normal student but Tyler has to take 2 extra classes. Each class is 45 minutes long. He goes to class for 4 days a week. He then spends 1/6 of his weekly minutes each on Saturday and Sunday as extra learning time. How many hours a week does he spend learning?
answer:
He takes 9+2=<<9+2=11>>11 classes a day
That means he spends 45*11=<<45*11=495>>495 minutes per day in class
So he spends 495*4=<<495*4=1980>>1980 minutes a week
That means he spends 1980*1/6=<<1980*1/6=330>>330 minutes each on Saturday and Sunday.
So he spends 1980+330+330=<<1980+330+330=2640>>2640 minutes per week
So he spends 2640/60=<<2640/60=44>>44 hours per week
#### 44
